name: Clean'Em Up
storyline: Your computer has been hacked... Dozens of viruses and other threats have penetrated your system... Files have been infected... Sectors have been damaged... The Security Army is your last hope to regain order throughout your system.
summary: Clean'Em Up is a fast paced, arcade-style isometric shooter with neon graphics. Play as an upgradable antivirus - seek and destroy tremendous viruses and threats, collect and protect files, and survive huge bosses.
